verses.english: Indeed, ˹it is˺ We ˹Who˺ sent this ˹Quran˺ down on the Night of Glory.<sup foot_note=77633>1</sup>
And what will make you realize what the Night of Glory is?

verses.arabic: لَيْلَةُ ٱلْقَدْرِ خَيْرٌ مِّنْ أَلْفِ شَهْرٍ
verses.english: The Night of Glory is better than a thousand months.

verses.arabic: تَنَزَّلُ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ فِيهَا بِإِذْنِ رَبِّهِم مِّن كُلِّ أَمْرٍ
verses.english: That night the angels and the ˹holy˺ spirit<sup foot_note=77634>1</sup> descend, by the permission of their Lord, for every ˹decreed˺ matter.
It is all peace until the break of dawn.
